body.content:
Verb tenses are placed into two buckets:

Bucket 1: Present System = Present Tense, Imperfect Tense, Future Tense

Bucket 2: Perfect System = Perfect Tense, Pluperfect Tense, Future Perfect Tense

Let's review these Tense endings!

Present System: Uses the 2nd principal part of the verb to conjugate and add the stem vowel:
  • 1st Conjugation (-a)
  • 2nd Conjugation (-e)
  • The stem formations look mostly the same as 1st and 2nd conjugations, but 3rd and 4th conjugations are different in the Present and Future tenses.

1st and 2nd Conjugation verbs use these endings:

 Present Personal EndingsImperfect Personal EndingsFuture Personal Endings
1st singular-o-bam-bo
2nd singular-s-bas-bis
3rd singular-t-bat-bit
1st plural-mus-bamus-bimus
2nd plural-tis-batis-bitis
3rd plural-nt-bant-bunt
Translationsam/is/are verbingwas/were verbing,

used to verb		will verb

3rd Conjugation verbs use these endings:

 Present Personal EndingsImperfect Personal EndingsFuture Personal Endings
1st singular-o-bam-am
2nd singular-s-bas-es
3rd singular-t-bat-et
1st plural-mus-bamus-emus
2nd plural-tis-batis-etis
3rd plural-nt-bant-ent
Translationsam/is/are verbingwas/were verbing,

used to verb		will verb
3rd-io and 4th Conjugation verbs use these endings:

 Present Personal EndingsImperfect Personal EndingsFuture Personal Endings
1st singular-io-iebam-iam
2nd singular-is-iebas-ees
3rd singular-it-iebat-iet
1st plural-imus-iebamus-iemus
2nd plural-itis-iebatis-ietis
3rd plural-niut-iebant-ient
Translationsam/is/are verbingwas/were verbing,

used to verb		will verb

Perfect System: Use the 3rd principal part of the verb to conjugate

Note: The 3rd principal part forms the Perfect stem by dropping the final -i and the Active Perfect, Pluperfect, and Future Perfect tense endings are added.

 Present Personal EndingsImperfect Personal EndingsFuture Personal Endings
1st singular-i-eram-ero
2nd singular-isti-eras-eris
3rd singular-it-erat-erit
1st plural-imus-eramus-erimus
2nd plural-isti-eratis-eritis
3rd plural-erunt-erant-erint
Translationshas/ have verbed, did verbhad verbwill have verbed
